Recommendations: 1. All faculty for Biology and Mathematics should be involved in Research and Extension activities.

2. One hundred percent of the Biology and Mathematics professors should develop their own instructional materials like workbooks, modules, etc. All instructional materials should be prepared beautifully.
3. Members of the accreditation task force should check carefully the survey instrument of the previous and present evaluation to avoid inconsistency
4. The system of filing documents is alright but there is still room for improvement
5. All documents in every area should be properly signed by concerned signatories
6. All faculty for Biology and Mathematics should become members of at least one scientific organization and honor society.
